native-fm.title: native.fm
native-fm.teaser: Powered by Bandcamp and SoundCloud, native.fm lets music lovers swap songs around the world.

kate-godwin.description: Designer of things and their screens

yahoo-sports.title: Yahoo! Sports
yahoo-sports.teaser: As an intern, I helped build Yahoo!'s London 2012 Olympics site which brought in over 2 billion pageviews.

plantr.teaser: Plantr is a sensor and mobile app kit for home and community gardening.

web-audio-synth.title: Web Audio Synth
web-audio-synth.teaser: A synthesizer made with the HTML5 web audio API, loosely based on the Commodore 64's sound interface.

park-find.title: Park Find
park-find.teaser: Atlanta has over 350 parks. More than likely, there's a park next door that you don't know about.
